016package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.controller;
017
018import android.content.Intent;
019import android.os.Bundle;
020import androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultLauncher;
021import androidx.activity.result.contract.ActivityResultContracts.StartActivityForResult;
022import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;
023import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
024import com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.GoogleSignInAccount;
025import com.google.android.material.snackbar.Snackbar;
026import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
027import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.R;
028import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.databinding.ActivityLoginBinding;
029import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.viewmodel.LoginViewModel;
030
031/**
032 * Presents a simple login screen, which is bypassed if a silent refresh/sign-in attempt succeeds.
033 */
034@AndroidEntryPoint
035public class LoginActivity extends AppCompatActivity {
036
037  private ActivityLoginBinding binding;
038  private LoginViewModel viewModel;
039  private ActivityResultLauncher<Intent> launcher;
040  private boolean silent;
041
042  @Override
043  protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
044    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
045    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(this).get(LoginViewModel.class);
046    getLifecycle().addObserver(viewModel);
047    launcher = registerForActivityResult(new StartActivityForResult(), viewModel::completeSignIn);
048    silent = true;
049    viewModel
050        .getAccount()
051        .observe(this, this::handleAccount);
052    viewModel
053        .getThrowable()
054        .observe(this, this::informFailure);
055  }
056
057  private void handleAccount(GoogleSignInAccount account) {
058    if (account != null) {
059      Intent intent = new Intent(this, MainActivity.class)
060          .addFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TASK | Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK);
061      startActivity(intent);
062    } else if (silent) {
063      silent = false;
064      binding = ActivityLoginBinding.inflate(getLayoutInflater());
065      binding.signIn.setOnClickListener((view) -> viewModel.startSignIn(launcher));
066      setContentView(binding.getRoot());
067    }
068  }
069
070  private void informFailure(Throwable throwable) {
071    if (throwable != null) {
072      Snackbar
073          .make(binding.getRoot(), R.string.login_failure_message, Snackbar.LENGTH_LONG)
074          .show();
075    }
076  }
077
078}
